<label text="A valid license for the MetaWare Debugger was not found.
The license manager cannot find your license file.
Make sure that your license file is in the /license directory in your tools distribution.
Contact ARC International at license@arc.com to purchase a license to use this software, to request a free evaluation, or to upgrade to the latest version.
Error text from FLEXlm: The license files (or server network addresses) attempted are listed below. Use LM_LICENSE_FILE to use a different license file, or contact your software provider for a license file.
The license file path is: /tmp\*.lic
Licensing DLL version: 9.6.1 "/>
